=== "Shared Template Variables"

    File paths need to be valid in the context where Kometa is running; this is primarily an issue when running in docker, as Kometa inside the container cannot see host paths.
    
    | Attribute                         | Description                                                                                                                   | Allowed Values (default in **bold**)                                                                                                                             |                  Required                  |
    |:----------------------------------|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:------------------------------------------:|
    | `collection_mode`                 | Controls the collection mode of all collections in a Defaults File.                                                           | `**default**` = Library default<br>`hide` = Hide Collection<br>`hide_items` = Hide Items in this Collection<br>`show_items` = Show this Collection and its Items |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `collection_section`              | Changes the sort order of the collection sections against other default collection sections.                                  | Any number<br>Use quotes to not lose leading zeros e.g. `"05"`                                                                                                   |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `delete_collections_named`        | Deletes any collections in Plex with one of the specified names.                                                              | List of collection names to delete                                                                                                                               |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `file_background_<<key>>`         | Sets the background filepath of the key's collection.                                                                         | Filepath directly to the image                                                                                                                                   |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `file_background`                 | Sets the background filepath for all collections.                                                                             | Filepath directly to the image                                                                                                                                   |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `file_poster_<<key>>`             | Sets the poster filepath of the key's collection.                                                                             | Filepath directly to the image                                                                                                                                   |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `file_poster`                     | Sets the poster filepath for all collections.                                                                                 | Filepath directly to the image                                                                                                                                   |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `ignore_ids`                      | Set TMDb/TVDb IDs to ignore in all collections.                                                                               | List or comma-separated string of TMDb/TVDb IDs                                                                                                                  |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `ignore_imdb_ids`                 | Set IMDb IDs to ignore in all collections.                                                                                    | List or comma-separated string of IMDb IDs                                                                                                                       |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `item_radarr_tag_<<key>>`         | Appends tag(s) in Radarr for each movie found by the key's builders.                                                          | List or comma-separated string of tags<br>Default: **`item_radarr_tag`**                                                                                         |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `item_radarr_tag`                 | Appends tag(s) in Radarr for all collections.                                                                                 | List or comma-separated string of tags                                                                                                                           |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `item_sonarr_tag_<<key>>`         | Appends tag(s) in Sonarr for each series found by the key's builders.                                                         | List or comma-separated string of tags<br>Default: **`item_sonarr_tag`**                                                                                         |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `item_sonarr_tag`                 | Appends tag(s) in Sonarr for all collections.                                                                                 | List or comma-separated string of tags                                                                                                                           |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `language`                        | Sets language of collection names and summaries.                                                                              | **`default`** = English, `fr` = French, `de` = German                                                                                                            |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `minimum_items_<<key>>`           | Minimum number of items required to create the key's collection.                                                              | Any number > 0                                                                                                                                                   |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `minimum_items`                   | Minimum number of items required to create all collections.                                                                   | Any number > 0                                                                                                                                                   |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `name_<<key>>`                    | Changes the name of the key's collection.                                                                                     | New collection name                                                                                                                                              |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `name_mapping`                    | Changes the name mapping for all collections.                                                                                 | Any string with `<<key_name>>` in it<br>Default: **`<<title>>`**                                                                                                 |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `order_<<key>>`                   | Controls sort order of the key's collection in its section.                                                                   | Any number                                                                                                                                                       |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `radarr_add_missing`              | Override Radarr `add_missing` attribute for all collections.                                                                  | `true`, `false`                                                                                                                                                  |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `radarr_add_missing_<<key>>`      | Override Radarr `add_missing` attribute for the key's collection.                                                             | `true`, `false`<br>Default: **`radarr_add_missing`** from Global level                                                                                           |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `radarr_folder`                   | Override Radarr `root_folder_path` for all collections.                                                                       | Folder path                                                                                                                                                      |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `radarr_folder_<<key>>`           | Override Radarr `root_folder_path` for the key's collection.                                                                  | Folder path<br>Default: **`radarr_folder`** from Global level                                                                                                    |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `radarr_monitor_existing`         | Override Radarr `monitor_existing` attribute for all collections.                                                             | `true`, `false`                                                                                                                                                  |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `radarr_monitor_existing_<<key>>` | Override Radarr `monitor_existing` attribute for the key's collection.                                                        | `true`, `false`                                                                                                                                                  |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `radarr_search`                   | Override Radarr `search` attribute for all collections.                                                                       | `true`, `false`                                                                                                                                                  |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `radarr_search_<<key>>`           | Override Radarr `search` attribute for the key's collection.                                                                  | `true`, `false`<br>Default: **`radarr_search`** from Global level                                                                                                |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `radarr_tag`                      | Override Radarr `tag` attribute for all collections.                                                                          | List or comma-separated string of tags                                                                                                                           |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `radarr_tag_<<key>>`              | Override Radarr `tag` attribute for the key's collection.                                                                     | List or comma-separated string of tags<br>Default: **`radarr_tag`** from Global level                                                                            |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `radarr_upgrade_existing`         | Override Radarr `upgrade_existing` attribute for all collections.                                                             | `true`, `false`                                                                                                                                                  |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `radarr_upgrade_existing_<<key>>` | Override Radarr `upgrade_existing` attribute for the key's collection.                                                        | `true`, `false`                                                                                                                                                  |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `schedule_<<key>>`                | Sets the schedule for a specific key's collection.                                                                            | Any [Scheduling Option](../../config/schedule.md#important)                                                                                                      |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `schedule`                        | Sets the schedule for all collections.                                                                                        | Any [Scheduling Option](../../config/schedule.md#important)                                                                                                      |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `sonarr_add_missing_<<key>>`      | Override Sonarr `add_missing` attribute for the key's collection.                                                             | `true`, `false`<br>Default: **`sonarr_add_missing`** from Global level                                                                                           |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `sonarr_add_missing`              | Override Sonarr `add_missing` attribute for all collections.                                                                  | `true`, `false`                                                                                                                                                  | :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }   |
    | `sonarr_folder_<<key>>`           | Override Sonarr `root_folder_path` for the key's collection.                                                                  | Folder path<br>Default: **`sonarr_folder`** from Global level                                                                                                    |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `sonarr_folder`                   | Override Sonarr `root_folder_path` for all collections.                                                                       | Folder path                                                                                                                                                      |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `sonarr_monitor_existing_<<key>>` | Override Sonarr `monitor_existing` attribute for the key's collection.                                                        | `true`, `false`                                                                                                                                                  |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `sonarr_monitor_existing`         | Override Sonarr `monitor_existing` attribute for all collections.                                                             | `true`, `false`                                                                                                                                                  |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `sonarr_search_<<key>>`           | Override Sonarr `search` attribute for the key's collection.                                                                  | `true`, `false`<br>Default: **`sonarr_search`** from Global level                                                                                                |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `sonarr_search`                   | Override Sonarr `search` attribute for all collections.                                                                       | `true`, `false`                                                                                                                                                  |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `sonarr_tag_<<key>>`              | Override Sonarr `tag` attribute for the key's collection.                                                                     | List or comma-separated string of tags<br>Default: **`sonarr_tag`** from Global level                                                                            |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `sonarr_tag`                      | Override Sonarr `tag` attribute for all collections.                                                                          | List or comma-separated string of tags                                                                                                                           |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `sonarr_upgrade_existing_<<key>>` | Override Sonarr `upgrade_existing` attribute for the key's collection.                                                        | `true`, `false`                                                                                                                                                  |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `sonarr_upgrade_existing`         | Override Sonarr `upgrade_existing` attribute for all collections.                                                             | `true`, `false`                                                                                                                                                  |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `sort_prefix`                     | Changes the prefix of the sort title.                                                                                         | Any string<br>Default: **`!`**                                                                                                                                   |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `sort_title`                      | Changes the sort title of all collections.                                                                                    | Any string<br>Default: **`<<sort_prefix>><<collection_section>><<pre>><<order_<<key>>>><<title>>`**                                                              |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `summary_<<key>>`                 | Changes the summary of the key's collection.                                                                                  | New collection summary                                                                                                                                           |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `url_background_<<key>>`          | Sets the background URL of the key's collection.                                                                              | URL directly to the image                                                                                                                                        |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `url_background`                  | Sets the background URL for all collections.                                                                                  | URL directly to the image                                                                                                                                        |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `url_poster_<<key>>`              | Changes the poster URL of the key's collection.                                                                               | URL directly to the image                                                                                                                                        |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `url_poster`                      | Changes the poster URL for all collections.                                                                                   | URL directly to the image                                                                                                                                        |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `use_<<key>>`                     | Turns off individual collections in a Defaults File.                                                                          | `**true**`, `false`                                                                                                                                              |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `use_all`                         | Turns off all collections in a Defaults File.                                                                                 | `true`, `false`                                                                                                                                                  |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `visible_home_<<key>>`            | Controls visibility on the Home tab for the key's collection. (Plex Pass required)                                            | `true` = Visible<br>`false` = Not Visible<br>[Any `schedule` Option](../../config/schedule.md) = Visible When Scheduled                                          |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `visible_home`                    | Controls visibility on the Home tab for all collections. (Plex Pass required)                                                 | `true` = Visible<br>`false` = Not Visible<br>[Any `schedule` Option](../../config/schedule.md) = Visible When Scheduled                                          |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `visible_library_<<key>>`         | Controls visibility on the Library Recommended tab for the key's collection. (Plex Pass required)                             | `true` = Visible<br>`false` = Not Visible<br>[Any `schedule` Option](../../config/schedule.md) = Visible When Scheduled                                          |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `visible_library`                 | Controls visibility on the Library Recommended tab for all collections. (Plex Pass required)                                  | `true` = Visible<br>`false` = Not Visible<br>[Any `schedule` Option](../../config/schedule.md) = Visible When Scheduled                                          |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `visible_shared_<<key>>`          | Controls visibility on Shared Users' Home tab for the key's collection. (Plex Pass required)                                  | `true` = Visible<br>`false` = Not Visible<br>[Any `schedule` Option](../../config/schedule.md) = Visible When Scheduled                                          |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `visible_shared`                  | Controls visibility on Shared Users' Home tab for all collections. (Plex Pass required)                                       | `true` = Visible<br>`false` = Not Visible<br>[Any `schedule` Option](../../config/schedule.md) = Visible When Scheduled                                          |  :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |

    1. Each default collection has a `key` that when calling to effect a specific collection you must replace `<<key>>` with when calling.
    <!--separator-variables-->

=== "Shared Separator Variables"
    
    | Attribute                 | Description                                                                                  | Allowed Values (default in **bold**)                                                                                                                                                                |                 Required                  |
    |:--------------------------|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|:-----------------------------------------:|
    | `collection_mode`         | Controls the collection mode of all collections in a Defaults File.                          | **`default`** = Library default<br>`hide` = Hide Collection<br>`hide_items` = Hide Items in this Collection<br>`show_items` = Show this Collection and its Items                                    | :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `collection_section`      | Changes the sort order of the collection sections against other default collection sections. | Any number                                                                                                                                                                                          | :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `name_separator`          | Changes the name of the key's collection.                                                    | New Collection Name                                                                                                                                                                                 | :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `placeholder_imdb_id`     | Add a placeholder Movie/Show to the Separator.                                               | IMDb ID<br>Valid for Movie or Show libraries assuming the ID points to an item of the correct type.                                                                                                 | :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `placeholder_tmdb_movie`  | Add a placeholder Movie to the Separator.                                                    | TMDb Movie ID<br>Only valid for Movie libraries.                                                                                                                                                    | :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `placeholder_tvdb_show`   | Add a placeholder Show to the Separator.                                                     | TVDb Show ID<br>Only valid for Show libraries.                                                                                                                                                      | :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `sep_style`               | Choose the [Separator Style](../../../../defaults/separators.md#separator-styles).                 | **`orig`**, `amethyst`, `aqua`, `blue`, `forest`, `fuchsia`, `gold`, `gray`, `green`, `navy`, `ocean`, `olive`, `orchid`, `pink`, `plum`, `purple`, `red`, `rust`, `salmon`, `sand`, `stb`, `tan`   | :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `sort_prefix`             | Changes the prefix of the sort title.                                                        | Any string<br>default: **`!`**                                                                                                                                                                      | :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `sort_title`              | Changes the sort title of all collections.                                                   | Any string<br>default: **`<<sort_prefix>><<collection_section>>_!<<title>>`**                                                                                                                       | :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `summary_separator`       | Changes the summary of the key's collection.                                                 | New Collection Summary                                                                                                                                                                              | :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `url_poster_separator`    | Changes the poster URL of the key's collection.                                              | URL directly to the image                                                                                                                                                                           | :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
    | `use_separator`           | Turn the [Separator Collection](../../../../defaults/separators.md#use-separators) off.            | **`true`**, `false`                                                                                                                                                                                 | :fontawesome-solid-circle-xmark:{ .red }  |
